info.name: Darkened PCGamer
info.description: A dark version of PC Gamer web pages is now available for you to use, with removed contents and added features for a much better browsing experience through those pages! ― Version: 19 (October 7, 2019) | View change logs
info.additionalInfo: IMPORTANT: For bug reports, please use Twitter and send me a tweet or a direct message with the link of your issue after posting it in the discussions down below! I don't receive any notifications when somebody is using the Discussions/Feedback button.
